name: es-tween
description: Module-friendly fork of [Tween.js](https://github.com/tweenjs/tween.js). Super simple, fast and easy to use tweening engine which incorporates optimised Robert Penner's equations.

scripts.test: npm run test-unit && npm run test-correctness && npm run test-style
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: tween.js contributors (https://github.com/tweenjs/tween.js/graphs/contributors)
